item.title: Scaling Beyond Autoregression
item.description: Speaker Jinjie Ni is an AI researcher and dedicated individual contributor at the National University of Singapore, working with Prof. Michael Shieh. His work centers on next generation modeling paradigms and the design of scalable foundation model systems. He is currently focused on several core areas: (1) LLM pretraining, scaling, and architectural innovation; (2) reinforcement learning methods that enhance reasoning capabilities in large language models; (3) and algorithmâ€“system co design aimed at pushing model efficiency and performance.
